abstract: Reruns of its popular procedurals put CBS on top of the ratings on Thursday.
snippet: Reruns of its popular procedurals put CBS on top of the ratings on Thursday.
lead_paragraph: Reruns of its popular procedurals put CBS on top of the ratings on Thursday, a night of mostly repeats and relatively small network television audiences. “CSI” at 9 p.m. delivered the most viewers overall, 10.8 million, according to Nielsen’s estimates. It was followed close behind by “Without a Trace” at 10 (10.5 million) and “CSI: NY” at 8 (9.6 million).
